qa.question: How much does YellowRoam cost?
qa.answer: YellowRoam has four tiers: Free, Explorer ($2.99/mo or $29/yr), Pathfinder ($7.99/mo or $69/yr), and Trailblazer Lifetime ($169 once).

qa.question: What are the subscription options?
qa.answer: Yes! The Free plan includes basic trip tools. Explorer adds multilingual filters. Pathfinder includes campground and RV tools. Trailblazer gives lifetime access plus concierge add-on eligibility.

qa.question: Tell me about the Free plan
qa.answer: The Free plan includes planning, 5 saved trips, and travel alerts. Great for day-trippers.

qa.question: What's included in Explorer?
qa.answer: Explorer adds 30 saved trips, multilingual support, and filters for pet- and kid-friendliness.

qa.question: What's the difference between Explorer and Pathfinder?
qa.answer: Pathfinder builds on Explorer with campground booking, RV route planning, trail ratings, and gear checklists.

qa.question: Do you offer a lifetime plan?
qa.answer: Yes—Trailblazer is a one-time $169 fee for lifetime access. No subscriptions ever.

qa.question: How does the concierge service work?
qa.answer: Our Concierge Add-On (only for Pathfinder and Trailblazer users) helps with booking hotels, RV spots, and more—for a small support fee.

qa.question: Is the app really free?
qa.answer: Yes—there’s always a Free plan with helpful features. No credit card needed.

qa.question: What do I get if I upgrade?
qa.answer: Upgrading gives you access to more saved trips, filters, planning tools, and booking help.

qa.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
qa.answer: Cancel anytime through your account settings. We’ll remind you before renewal.

qa.question: Can I switch plans?
qa.answer: You can upgrade or downgrade plans at any time. Your changes take effect on the next billing cycle.

qa.question: Is the concierge service worth it?
qa.answer: Yes, especially if you want a human to help with complex bookings or route planning.

qa.question: Do you offer refunds?
qa.answer: Refunds are available within the first 7 days of paid plans. Contact support for help.

qa.question: What happens if I lose signal in the park?
qa.answer: Offline mode is in development. For now, you can pre-load your itinerary to use with low signal.

qa.question: How many trips can I save?
qa.answer: Free = 5 trips, Explorer = 30, Pathfinder/Trailblazer = Unlimited.

qa.question: Can I use the app offline?
qa.answer: Offline support is being added soon. Trip data will still show if preloaded.

qa.question: Is this just for Yellowstone?
qa.answer: YellowRoam covers the entire Yellowstone loop, Grand Teton, and surrounding towns like Bozeman and Cody.

qa.question: What makes YellowRoam different?
qa.answer: It’s built *just* for Yellowstone travelers, with filters and features generic apps miss.

qa.question: What is included in Trailblazer?
qa.answer: Trailblazer includes all features, future updates, and access to concierge booking support.

qa.question: Can I book campgrounds with YellowRoam?
qa.answer: Yes, Pathfinder and Trailblazer users can access booking help for popular campgrounds.

qa.question: What if I need help booking a hotel?
qa.answer: Absolutely—our concierge team can help book hotels, glamping spots, or remote stays.

qa.question: Can I upgrade at any time?
qa.answer: Yep! You can upgrade at any time and keep your saved trips.

qa.question: Are there discounts for families?
qa.answer: Not yet, but we’re working on family pricing bundles soon.

qa.question: Do I get early access with any plan?
qa.answer: Trailblazer users get first access to new features, beta tools, and upgrades.

qa.question: What happens when the Founding rates end?
qa.answer: Founding rates are temporary. Lock in your price now before public launch pricing begins.

qa.question: What if I travel with pets?
qa.answer: Yes! Our filters show dog-friendly hikes, stays, and dining options.

qa.question: Can kids use this?
qa.answer: Kid-friendly trails, food, and maps are built into Explorer and above.

qa.question: Is this app for RV travelers?
qa.answer: Pathfinder and Trailblazer are great for RVs—includes route planning and dump stations.

qa.question: What if I need gluten-free options?
qa.answer: Yes—our filters include gluten-free, vegan, and allergy-friendly food recs.

qa.question: Can I use this in Grand Teton too?
qa.answer: Yes! Grand Teton is fully included with hikes, wildlife tips, and lodging.

qa.question: How does billing work?
qa.answer: Billing is monthly or yearly depending on your plan. No hidden fees.

qa.question: Will my data be saved?
qa.answer: All saved trips and preferences stay synced to your account.

qa.question: Do you send email reminders?
qa.answer: Yes, we’ll send reminders before renewals and special alerts during your trip.

qa.question: Does the app support different languages?
qa.answer: Explorer and above offer full multilingual support—including Hindi and Swedish.

qa.question: How do I contact support?
qa.answer: Use the RoamReach form to get help, or upgrade for concierge support.

qa.question: Can I gift a subscription?
qa.answer: Gifting will be available soon. Stay tuned for a Trailblazer gift pass.

qa.question: What's the best plan for a 10-day trip?
qa.answer: Explorer is great for shorter trips, Pathfinder or Trailblazer for full park loops.

qa.question: What are local tips?
qa.answer: Local tips are included for each destination—hidden hikes, scenic stops, and insider recs.

qa.question: Do you help with hiking plans?
qa.answer: Yes! We help plan hikes by difficulty and interest. Great for families and adventurers.

qa.question: Can I use YellowRoam for group travel?
qa.answer: Group travel tools are in development, but you can share itineraries easily now.

qa.question: Does the Free plan expire?
qa.answer: Nope—Free plan stays free as long as you want it.

qa.question: Is there a yearly version of Explorer?
qa.answer: Yes, Explorer is available for $2.99/month or $29/year—you pick.

qa.question: Do you charge sales tax?
qa.answer: We only charge tax where legally required. Most states don't apply sales tax to apps.

qa.question: Is the lifetime plan really one-time?
qa.answer: Yes, Trailblazer is a true one-time fee. You pay once—never again.

qa.question: What if I want to downgrade?
qa.answer: Downgrading is easy and takes effect after your billing cycle ends.

qa.question: How often do features get updated?
qa.answer: We release new features and updates every 2–4 weeks, based on user feedback.

qa.question: Will I lose data if I cancel?
qa.answer: Your data stays safe—even if you cancel, your trips are stored in case you come back.

qa.question: What does unlimited trips mean?
qa.answer: Unlimited trips means you can save as many full itineraries as you want—no limits.

qa.question: Does concierge include phone support?
qa.answer: Concierge is mostly chat- and email-based now, with phone support in development.

qa.question: Can I use this while driving?
qa.answer: Yes! Use the app in your vehicle with pre-loaded maps and safe driving mode.

qa.question: Do I have to log in every time?
qa.answer: Nope—once you’re logged in, you’ll stay logged in unless you clear your browser or app settings.
